content: It's been an amazing year working with this software engineer! They hit the ground running and quickly became one of the most productive members of our team. Their contributions to the "Classes" and "Late Cancellations" projects have been invaluable, and their ability to learn new technologies and take on challenging tasks has made them a valuable asset to our team. We are so grateful to have them on our team and look forward to continuing to work with them in the future. Great job!
